ygData.subject: RE: Pair of Bent spectacles/Lt. Guard
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, that rings a bell. I tracked a Lt in North Karana once, and went out to find him since I had never seen the name before.  He was green to me in the low
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, that rings a bell. I tracked a Lt in North Karana once, and went out
to find him since I had never seen the name before. He was green to me in
the low 30's. He was just a little northwest of the wooden bridge, just
standing out in the meadow. He didn't respond when I hailed him, and he
soon started walking west. The fact that he was on my tracking list
indicates that he probably had just recently spawned (anyone who knows how
tracking for over 30 rangers works will understand), so unless he spawns in
a random spot, I'd look for him there. I didn't kill him, since he conned
amiably to me (and I'm a good little ranger :). Hope this helps.

Telon on E'ci
> ----------
> From: TSandrich@...[SMTP:TSandrich@...]
> Reply To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 8:33 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Pair of Bent spectacles/Lt. Guard
>
> From: TSandrich@...
>
> This item is dropped by the Lt. in N Karrana, and I have never seen this
> guard. Perhaps he is blind and can't find the guard towers. If anyone
> has
> any info as to where he is, I would greatly appreciate it. Yes, there
> will
> be a horrible faction hit, but that's the way it goes. Thanks all.
>
